HotelElement.Name: Hotel Paris Louis Blanc (Formerly Campanile Paris X Gare du Nord)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Paris Louis Blanc in Paris (Gare du Nord - Gare de L'Est), you'll be minutes from Place de la Bataille-de-Stalingrad and close to Louvre Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of Colonel Fabien Square and Canceropole.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 91 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Paris Louis Blanc.

Business, Other Amenities
Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Paris Louis Blanc.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Paris Louis Blanc is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Campanile Paris 10 - Gare du Nord is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi.
